title: Drawing, "White Persian Cat on a Tray", 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
description: White Persian cat lying on black tray with an elaborate cut out rim.

Drawing, "White Persian Cat on a Tray", 1941.
1941. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-8.
